column2: "...Hey, Harriet. Just to confirm, this is where the enemies are swarming, right?"
"Yes. At their center lies the spirit vein."
"We've confirmed the enemy's battle formations, too. They seem to be protecting the vein."
"Sneaking would be impossible in such a wide-open area."
"There's no choice but to take them in an all-out head-on clash. Hehehehehe."
"Why are you getting excited about that..."
"Lisa is correct. We have no choice but to break through their front. Guardian, it is up to you."
